content:
Function CamelToColonHyphen in package utils: CamelToColonHyphen converts a CamelCase string to a string
where the first transition is marked with a colon and subsequent
transitions are marked with hyphens. Consecutive uppercase letters
are treated as a single word.
Function ConvertToCamelCase in package utils: ConvertToCamelCase 将蛇形字符串转换为大写开头的驼峰式字符串
Function IsVowel in package utils: IsVowel checks if a character is a vowel

Function ModelNameToTable in package utils: ModelNameToTable converts a CamelCase model name to a snake_case table name
with the last word in plural form.
Function ToPlural in package utils: ToPlural converts a singular noun to its plural form
Function OssAdapter in package adapters: OssAdapter constructs an Aliyun OSS filesystem adapter

Method RefreshUrlIfExpired of type Oss in package adapters: RefreshUrlIfExpired 检测链接是否过期；若过期或接近过期（在 refreshThreshold 秒内），生成并返回新的链接，否则返回原链接
支持 V1（Expires）与 V4（x-oss-date + x-oss-expires）两种签名格式判断
refreshThreshold: 在过期前多少秒内进行刷新（默认为 0，即仅在过期时刷新）
Method SetVisibility of type Oss in package adapters: SetVisibility: OSS doesn't support per-object ACL change via this adapter; noop

Method Url of type Oss in package adapters: Url 生成可下载链接：
- 若为私有桶，返回带签名的限时下载链接（默认 ttl 或 3600s）
- 若为公开桶，优先使用配置的 domain，否则使用 bucket.endpoint 组合
Type OssFileInfo in package adapters: OssFileInfo implements fs.FileInfo for OSS objects
Method PolicyToken of type Qiniu in package adapters: PolicyToken 创建自定义上传策略的令牌 see https://github.com/qiniu/go-sdk/blob/master/examples/create_uptoken.go
Method SetVisibility of type Qiniu in package adapters: SetVisibility 七牛不支持修改单个文件的可见性

Type Application in package contracts: Application 应用程序接口
application interface

Type BloomFilterDriver in package contracts: BloomFilterDriver 通过名称与配置信息获取布隆过滤器
Get bloom filter by name and configuration info.

Type CacheStoreProvider in package contracts: CacheStoreProvider 缓存存储提供者
cache storage provider.

Type CommandProvider in package contracts: CommandProvider 命令提供者
command provider.

Type Component in package contracts: Component 可注入的类
injectable class.

Type DBConnector in package contracts: DBConnector 获取数据库连接实例
Get a database connection instance.

Type FileSystemProvider in package contracts: FileSystemProvider 通过给定的名称和配置信息获取文件系统
Get the filesystem with the given name and configuration information.

Type GateChecker in package contracts: GateChecker 权限检查器
permission checker.

Type GateHook in package contracts: GateHook 权限钩子
permission hook.

Type GuardDriver in package contracts: GuardDriver 守卫驱动程序
guard driver

Type InstanceProvider in package contracts: InstanceProvider 容器实例提供者
container instance provider

Type MagicalFunc in package contracts: MagicalFunc 可以通过容器调用的魔术方法
Magic methods that can be called from the container.

Type MailerDriver in package contracts: MailerDriver 通过给定的名称和配置信息获取邮件驱动程序
Get mail driver by given name and configuration info.

Type Pipe in package contracts: Pipe 通过可用管道之一发送对象
Send an object through one of the available pipelines.

Type Policy in package contracts: Policy 权限策略, 一组检查器
Permission policy, a set of checkers.

Type QueryCallback in package contracts: QueryCallback 查询回调，用于构建子查询
query callback，for building subqueries.

Type QueryFunc in package contracts: QueryFunc 用于构造 子 where 表达式
Used to construct sub-where expressions.

Type QueryProvider in package contracts: QueryProvider 查询提供者
query provider.

Type QueueDriver in package contracts: QueueDriver 通过给定的信息获取队列连接
Get queue connection with given information.

Type RedisSubscribeFunc in package contracts: RedisSubscribeFunc 订阅给定的消息频道
Subscribe to a given message channel.
Type RelationType in package contracts: RelationType 关联关系

Type ServiceProvider in package contracts: ServiceProvider 服务提供者接口
Service Provider Interface.

Type UserProviderDriver in package contracts: UserProviderDriver 用户提供者驱动程序
User Provider Driver
Type Validatable in package contracts: Validatable 可验证的表单

Method WhereBetween of type Builder in package querybuilder: WhereBetween args 参数可以是整数、浮点数、字符串、any 等类型的数组，或者用` and `隔开的字符串，或者在源码中了解更多 https://github.com/goal-web/querybuilder/blob/78bcc832604bfcdb68579e3dd1441796a16994cf/builder.go#L74

Method WhereIn of type Builder in package querybuilder: WhereIn args 参数可以是整数、浮点数、字符串、any 等类型的数组，或者用` and `隔开的字符串，或者在源码中了解更多 https://github.com/goal-web/querybuilder/blob/78bcc832604bfcdb68579e3dd1441796a16994cf/builder.go#L74
Type ColumnInfo in package migrate: ColumnInfo 结构体用于存储表的列信息
Type IndexInfo in package migrate: IndexInfo 用于接收 MySQL 表索引信息的结构体
Function AllDirectories in package utils: AllDirectories 获取一个目录下的所有目录
Function AllFiles in package utils: AllFiles 获取一个目录下的所有文件
Function CamelString in package utils: CamelString 驼峰
Function CopyFile in package utils: CopyFile 复制一个文件
Function EachMap in package utils: EachMap 遍历任意 map
Function EachSlice in package utils: EachSlice 遍历任意 slice 或者 array
Function EachStructField in package utils: EachStructField 遍历结构体的字段
Function ExceptFields in package utils: ExceptFields 只获取指定 key 以外的数据
Function FileExists in package utils: FileExists 文件是否存在
Function GetBoolField in package utils: GetBoolField 获取 ToFields 中的 bool，会尝试转换类型
Function GetFloat64Field in package utils: GetFloat64Field 获取 ToFields 中的 float64，会尝试转换类型
Function GetFloatField in package utils: GetFloatField 获取 ToFields 中的 float32，会尝试转换类型
Function GetInt64Field in package utils: GetInt64Field 获取 ToFields 中的 int64，会尝试转换类型
Function GetIntField in package utils: GetIntField 获取 ToFields 中的 int，会尝试转换类型
Function GetMapKeys in package utils: GetMapKeys 获取 ToFields 的所有 key
Function GetStringField in package utils: GetStringField 获取 ToFields 中的字符串，会尝试转换类型
Function GetSubField in package utils: GetSubField 获取下级 ToFields ，如果没有的话，匹配同前缀的放到下级 ToFields 中
Function GetTypeKey in package utils: GetTypeKey 获取类型唯一字符串
Function IfString in package utils: IfString 类似三目运算
Function Ifi in package utils: Ifi 类似三目运算，返回第一个不是 nil 的值
Function IntOr in package utils: IntOr 尽量不返回0值
Function IsArray in package utils: IsArray 是否是数组或者 slice
Function IsEqual in package utils: IsEqual 等于 =
Function IsGt in package utils: IsGt 大于 >
Function IsGte in package utils: IsGte 大于等于
Function IsIn in package utils: IsIn 存在 in
Function IsInstanceIn in package utils: IsInstanceIn InstanceIn 判断变量是否是某些类型
Function IsLt in package utils: IsLt 小于 <
Function IsLte in package utils: IsLte 小于等于 <=
Function IsNotIn in package utils: IsNotIn 不存在 not in
Function IsSameStruct in package utils: IsSameStruct 判断是否同一个结构体
Function JoinFloat64Array in package utils: JoinFloat64Array 连接 float64 数组，类似 strings.Join
Function JoinFloatArray in package utils: JoinFloatArray 连接 float32 数组，类似 strings.Join
Function JoinInt64Array in package utils: JoinInt64Array 连接 int64 数组，类似 strings.Join
Function JoinIntArray in package utils: JoinIntArray 连接 int 数组，类似 strings.Join
Function JoinInterfaceArray in package utils: JoinInterfaceArray 连接 interface 数组，类似 strings.Join
Function JoinStringerArray in package utils: JoinStringerArray 连接fmt.Stringer数组，类似 strings.Join
Function LoadEnv in package utils: LoadEnv 加载 .env 文件
Function MakeSymbolArray in package utils: MakeSymbolArray 创建一个有指定字符组成的数组
Function Md5 in package utils: Md5 生成 md5 字符串
Function MergeFields in package utils: MergeFields 合并两个 contracts.Fields
Function NotNil in package utils: NotNil 尽量不要 nil
Function OnlyExistsFields in package utils: OnlyExistsFields 只获取指定 key ，不存在或者 nil 则忽略
Function OnlyFields in package utils: OnlyFields 只获取指定 key 的数据
Function ParseStructTag in package utils: ParseStructTag 解析结构体的tag
Function RandStr in package utils: RandStr 生成随机字符串

Function RandomStringBySeed in package utils: RandomStringBySeed 根据种子生成确定性的随机字符串
seed: 随机种子（相同种子生成相同结果）
length: 字符串长度
charset: 可选字符集（默认包含大小写字母和数字）
Function SetInterval in package utils: SetInterval 设置一个定时器，类似 js 的 SetInterval，返回一个用于关闭该定时器的通道
Function SnakeString in package utils: SnakeString 蛇形字符串
Function StringArray2InterfaceArray in package utils: StringArray2InterfaceArray 把字符串数组转成 any 数组
Function StringOr in package utils: StringOr 尽量不返回空字符串
Function SubString in package utils: SubString 切割字符串
Function ToBool in package utils: ToBool 把能转换成 bool 的值转换成 bool
Function ToFields in package utils: ToFields 尝试把一个变量转换成 ToFields 类型
Function ToFloat in package utils: ToFloat 把能转换成 float32 的值转换成 float32
Function ToFloat64 in package utils: ToFloat64 把能转换成 float64 的值转换成 float64
Function ToInt in package utils: ToInt 把能转换成 int 的值转换成 int
Function ToInt16 in package utils: ToInt16 把能转换成 int 的值转换成 int
Function ToInt32 in package utils: ToInt32 把能转换成 int 的值转换成 int
Function ToInt64 in package utils: ToInt64 把能转换成 int64 的值转换成 int64
Function ToInt8 in package utils: ToInt8 把能转换成 int 的值转换成 int
Function ToString in package utils: ToString 把能转换成 string 的值转换成 string
Function ToTypes in package utils: ToTypes 把变量转换成反射类型
Function ToUInt in package utils: uint
Function ToUInt16 in package utils: uint
Function ToUInt32 in package utils: uint
Function ToUInt64 in package utils: uint
Function ToUInt8 in package utils: uint
Function ToValue in package utils: ToValue 把 interface 转换成指定类型的 reflect.Value

Method ReadFrom of type File in package drivers: ReadFrom reads a binary representation of the BloomFilter (such as might
have been written by WriteTo()) from an i/o stream. It returns the number
of bytes read.

Method TestAndAdd of type File in package drivers: TestAndAdd is the equivalent to calling Test(data) then Add(data).
Returns the result of Test.

Method TestAndAddString of type File in package drivers: TestAndAddString is the equivalent to calling Test(string) then Add(string).
Returns the result of Test.

Method TestOrAdd of type File in package drivers: TestOrAdd is the equivalent to calling Test(data) then if not present Add(data).
Returns the result of Test.

Method TestOrAddString of type File in package drivers: TestOrAddString is the equivalent to calling Test(string) then if not present Add(string).
Returns the result of Test.

Method WriteTo of type File in package drivers: WriteTo writes a binary representation of the BloomFilter to an i/o stream.
It returns the number of bytes written.

Method TestAndAdd of type Redis in package drivers: TestAndAdd is the equivalent to calling Test(data) then Add(data).
Returns the result of Test.

Method TestAndAddString of type Redis in package drivers: TestAndAddString is the equivalent to calling Test(string) then Add(string).
Returns the result of Test.

Method TestOrAdd of type Redis in package drivers: TestOrAdd is the equivalent to calling Test(data) then if not present Add(data).
Returns the result of Test.

Method TestOrAddString of type Redis in package drivers: TestOrAddString is the equivalent to calling Test(string) then if not present Add(string).
Returns the result of Test.

Package auth: Package auth provides authentication functionality and singleton access.
包 auth 提供认证功能和单例访问。

Package auth provides authentication functionality and singleton access.
包 auth 提供认证功能和单例访问。

Package auth provides authentication functionality and singleton access.
包 auth 提供认证功能和单例访问。

Package auth provides authentication functionality and singleton access.
包 auth 提供认证功能和单例访问。

Package auth provides authentication functionality and singleton access.
包 auth 提供认证功能和单例访问。

Package auth provides authentication functionality and singleton access.
包 auth 提供认证功能和单例访问。

Function Default in package auth: Default returns the singleton instance of the auth service.
Default 返回认证服务的单例实例。

Function ExtendGuard in package auth: ExtendGuard extends the guard with a custom driver.
ExtendGuard 使用自定义驱动扩展守卫。

Function ExtendUserProvider in package auth: ExtendUserProvider extends the user provider with a custom driver.
ExtendUserProvider 使用自定义驱动扩展用户提供者。

Function GetGuard in package auth: GetGuard returns the authentication guard with the given name.
GetGuard 返回指定名称的认证守卫。

Function Guard in package auth: Guard creates a middleware that checks authentication using the specified guards.
Guard 创建使用指定守卫检查认证的中间件。

Function GuestMiddleware in package auth: GuestMiddleware ensures that the user is a guest (not authenticated).
GuestMiddleware 确保用户是访客（未认证）。

Function Middleware in package auth: Middleware ensures that the user is authenticated.
Middleware 确保用户已认证。

Function NewService in package auth: NewService creates a new instance of the auth service provider.
NewService 创建认证服务提供者的新实例。

Function UserProvider in package auth: UserProvider returns the user provider with the given name.
UserProvider 返回指定名称的用户提供者。

Type Auth in package auth: Auth implements the authentication service interface.
Auth 实现认证服务接口。

Method ExtendGuard of type Auth in package auth: ExtendGuard registers a custom guard driver.
ExtendGuard 注册自定义守卫驱动。

Method ExtendUserProvider of type Auth in package auth: ExtendUserProvider registers a custom user provider driver.
ExtendUserProvider 注册自定义用户提供者驱动。

Method Guard of type Auth in package auth: Guard returns an authentication guard instance with the given name.
Guard 返回指定名称的认证守卫实例。

Method UserProvider of type Auth in package auth: UserProvider returns a user provider instance with the given name.
UserProvider 返回指定名称的用户提供者实例。

Type Config in package auth: Config holds authentication configuration.
Config 保存认证配置。

Type Defaults in package auth: Defaults holds default configuration values for authentication.
Defaults 保存认证的默认配置值。

Type GuardException in package auth: GuardException represents an error related to authentication guards.
GuardException 表示与认证守卫相关的错误。

Type UserProviderException in package auth: UserProviderException represents an error related to user providers.
UserProviderException 表示与用户提供者相关的错误。

Package cache: Package cache provides caching functionality and singleton access.
包 cache 提供缓存功能和单例访问。

Package cache provides caching functionality and singleton access.
包 cache 提供缓存功能和单例访问。

Package cache provides caching functionality and singleton access.
包 cache 提供缓存功能和单例访问。

Package cache provides caching functionality and singleton access.
包 cache 提供缓存功能和单例访问。

Package cache provides caching functionality and singleton access.
包 cache 提供缓存功能和单例访问。

Function Add in package cache: Add adds a value to the cache with an expiration time if it doesn't exist.
Add 如果不存在则将带过期时间的值添加到缓存中。

Function CacheGet in package cache: CacheGet retrieves a value from the cache by key.
CacheGet 根据键从缓存中获取值。

Function Decrement in package cache: Decrement decrements the value of the given key by the given value.
Decrement 按给定值减少指定键的值。

Function Default in package cache: Default returns the singleton instance of the cache factory.
Default 返回缓存工厂的单例实例。

Function Extend in package cache: Extend registers a custom cache store provider.
Extend 注册自定义缓存存储提供者。

Function Flush in package cache: Flush flushes all values from the cache.
Flush 清空缓存中的所有值。

Function Forever in package cache: Forever puts a value to the cache without expiration time.
Forever 将无过期时间的值放入缓存中。

Function Forget in package cache: Forget removes a value from the cache by key.
Forget 根据键从缓存中删除值。

Function GetPrefix in package cache: GetPrefix returns the cache key prefix.
GetPrefix 返回缓存键前缀。

Function Increment in package cache: Increment increments the value of the given key by the given value.
Increment 按给定值增加指定键的值。

Function Many in package cache: Many retrieves multiple values from the cache by keys.
Many 根据键列表从缓存中获取多个值。

Function NewService in package cache: NewService creates a new instance of the cache service provider.
NewService 创建缓存服务提供者的新实例。

Function Pull in package cache: Pull retrieves and removes a value from the cache by key.
Pull 根据键从缓存中获取并删除值。

Function Put in package cache: Put puts a value to the cache with an expiration time.
Put 将带过期时间的值放入缓存中。

Function PutMany in package cache: PutMany puts multiple values to the cache with an expiration time.
PutMany 将多个带过期时间的值放入缓存中。

Function Remember in package cache: Remember retrieves a value from the cache or executes the callback to set it.
Remember 从缓存中获取值，如果不存在则执行回调函数设置值。

Function RememberForever in package cache: RememberForever retrieves a value from the cache or executes the callback to set it without expiration.
RememberForever 从缓存中获取值，如果不存在则执行回调函数设置值，无过期时间。

Function Store in package cache: Store returns a cache store instance with the given name.
Store 返回指定名称的缓存存储实例。

Type Config in package cache: Config holds cache configuration.
Config 保存缓存配置。

Type DriverException in package cache: DriverException represents an error in the cache module drivers.
DriverException 表示缓存模块驱动中的错误。
Method FindConvertibleArg of type ArgumentsTypeMap in package container: FindConvertibleArg 找到可转换的参数
Method StaticCall of type Container in package container: StaticCall 静态调用，直接传静态化的方法
Method StaticCallByArguments of type Container in package container: StaticCallByArguments 静态调用，直接传静态化的方法和处理好的参数
Method Handle of type RequestAfterListener in package session: Handle 如果开启了 session 那么请求结束时保存 session
Function Default in package config: Default 返回配置单例。仅在首次调用时从默认应用中获取并缓存。

Function EncryptionCommand in package config: EncryptionCommand 返回用于加密/解密环境文件的 CLI 命令与处理器。
支持指定驱动与密钥，不指定密钥时自动生成并在日志中输出。
Function Get in package config: Get 按点号路径获取配置值（如 "app.debug"）。

Function New in package config: New 创建一个配置实例，基于给定的环境源与模块提供器。
并发安全：写入使用写锁，读取使用读锁；环境值在未设置字段时作为后备。

Function NewDotEnv in package config: NewDotEnv 创建基于 DotEnv（键值对）数据源的环境读取器。
支持从本地文件或远程地址加载，OS 环境变量优先级最高。
Function NewService in package config: NewService 创建配置服务提供器，将 env 与各模块配置提供器注册到应用。

Function NewToml in package config: NewToml 创建基于 TOML 数据源的环境读取器。
多个数据源将按顺序合并，后者可覆盖前者同名键。

Function NewYaml in package config: NewYaml 创建基于 YAML 数据源的环境读取器。
多个数据源将按顺序合并，后者可覆盖前者同名键。
Function Reload in package config: Reload 重新计算并加载所有已注册的配置提供器（文件/URL/环境）。
Function Set in package config: Set 设置或覆盖一个配置键的值，线程安全。
Function ToEnvKey in package config: ToEnvKey 将 key 转换为大写，并将 . 替换为 _
Function Unset in package config: Unset 删除指定配置键。
Function WithFields in package config: WithFields 以已有字段初始化一个配置实例，常用于测试或注入默认值。
Function Register in package controllers: Register 注册路由函数

Function NewRedisCache in package drivers: NewRedisCache 创建Redis缓存实例
改进：添加参数验证
Method CleanupAllExpired of type Memory in package drivers: CleanupAllExpired 清理所有过期项
Method GetKeys of type Memory in package drivers: GetKeys 获取所有键（用于调试和监控）
Method GetKeysByPattern of type Memory in package drivers: GetKeysByPattern 根据模式获取键列表（简单实现）
Method GetStats of type Memory in package drivers: GetStats 获取缓存统计信息
Method Exists of type RedisStore in package drivers: Exists 检查键是否存在
Method GetKeysByPattern of type RedisStore in package drivers: GetKeysByPattern 根据模式获取键列表
Method GetStats of type RedisStore in package drivers: GetStats 获取缓存统计信息
Method GetTTL of type RedisStore in package drivers: GetTTL 获取键的剩余生存时间
Method ScanKeys of type RedisStore in package drivers: ScanKeys 扫描键（用于大数据集）
Method Eval of type Connection in package redis: scripting start
Method EvalWithContext of type Connection in package redis: scripting start
Method Get of type Connection in package redis: getter start
Method GetWithContext of type Connection in package redis: getter start
Method HGet of type Connection in package redis: hash start
Method HGetWithContext of type Connection in package redis: hash start
Method SAdd of type Connection in package redis: set start
Method SAddWithContext of type Connection in package redis: set start
Method Set of type Connection in package redis: setter start
Method SetWithContext of type Connection in package redis: setter start
Method Add of type Group in package routing: Add 添加路由，method 只允许字符串或者字符串数组
Method Group of type Group in package routing: Group 添加一个子组
Function WrapException in package exceptions: WrapException 包装 recover 的返回值

Function AddHeaderAndFormatFiles in package gen: AddHeaderAndFormatFiles 给文件数组中的每个文件添加头部注释、移除未使用的引用，并格式化代码
参数:
- files: 文件路径数组，表示需要处理的文件列表
- headerComment: 需要添加的文件头部注释内容
Function CapitalizeFirstLetter in package gen: CapitalizeFirstLetter 将单词的首字母大写
Function ConvertCamelToSnake in package gen: ConvertCamelToSnake converts a string from CamelCase to snake_case
Function GenRouter in package gen: GenRouter 通过指定的 importPath 和 usage 动态修改指定 Go 文件中的路由注册函数
Function GenServices in package gen: GenServices 生成 service 代码
Function GetModuleNameAndDir in package gen: GetModuleNameAndDir 获取模块名和模块根目录
Function GoType in package gen: GoType 将 Proto 类型映射为 Go 类型
Function NotContains in package gen: NotContains 返回 true，如果字符串中不包含指定的子串
Function SDKServices in package gen: SDKServices 生成 service 代码
Function SubString in package gen: SubString 切割字符串
Function ToCamelCase in package gen: ToCamelCase 将字符串转换为大写开头的驼峰命名（PascalCase）
Function ToSnakeCase in package gen: ToSnakeCase 将驼峰命名转换为蛇形命名
Function ToTags in package gen: ToTags 生成 tag
Function TsType in package gen: TsType 将 Proto 类型映射为 typescript 类型
Type Proto in package gen: Proto 数据结构定义
Method Each of type Collection in package collection: Each 遍历并且返回新的集合
Method Filter of type Collection in package collection: Filter 过滤不需要的数据 filter 返回 true 时保留
Method Foreach of type Collection in package collection: Foreach 遍历
Method SafeAvg of type Collection in package collection: SafeAvg struct 或者 map 情况下需要传 key
Method SafeMax of type Collection in package collection: SafeMax struct 或者 map 情况下需要传 key
Method SafeMin of type Collection in package collection: SafeMin struct 或者 map 情况下需要传 key
Method SafeSum of type Collection in package collection: SafeSum struct 或者 map 情况下需要传 key
Method Skip of type Collection in package collection: Skip 过滤不需要的数据 skipper 返回 true 时过滤

Package guards: Package guards contains authentication guard implementations.
包 guards 包含认证守卫的实现。

Package guards contains authentication guard implementations.
包 guards 包含认证守卫的实现。

Function SessionGuard in package guards: SessionGuard creates a session-based authentication guard.
SessionGuard 创建基于会话的认证守卫。

Type Jwt in package guards: Jwt implements a JWT-based authentication guard.
Jwt 实现基于 JWT 的认证守卫。

Method Check of type Jwt in package guards: Check verifies if a user is authenticated.
Check 验证用户是否已认证。

Method Error of type Jwt in package guards: Error returns any authentication errors.
Error 返回任何认证错误。

Method GetAuthenticatableKey of type Jwt in package guards: GetAuthenticatableKey returns the key of the authenticated user.
GetAuthenticatableKey 返回认证用户的键。

Method Guest of type Jwt in package guards: Guest verifies if the user is a guest (not authenticated).
Guest 验证用户是否为访客（未认证）。

Method Login of type Jwt in package guards: Login authenticates the user and generates a JWT token.
Login 认证用户并生成 JWT 令牌。

Method Logout of type Jwt in package guards: Logout logs the user out by blacklisting the JWT token.
Logout 通过将 JWT 令牌列入黑名单来注销用户。

Method Once of type Jwt in package guards: Once authenticates the user without storing in session.
Once 认证用户但不存储在会话中。

Method SetRedis of type Jwt in package guards: SetRedis sets the Redis connection for token blacklisting.
SetRedis 设置用于令牌黑名单的 Redis 连接。

Method SetToken of type Jwt in package guards: SetToken sets the JWT token to be used for authentication.
SetToken 设置用于认证的 JWT 令牌。

Method User of type Jwt in package guards: User returns the currently authenticated user.
User 返回当前认证的用户。

Method Verify of type Jwt in package guards: Verify validates a JWT token and returns the authenticated user.
Verify 验证 JWT 令牌并返回认证用户。

Type JwtAuthClaims in package guards: JwtAuthClaims represents the claims in a JWT token for authentication.
JwtAuthClaims 表示用于认证的 JWT 令牌中的声明。

Type Session in package guards: Session implements a session-based authentication guard.
Session 实现基于会话的认证守卫。

Method Check of type Session in package guards: Check verifies if a user is authenticated.
Check 验证用户是否已认证。

Method Error of type Session in package guards: Error returns any authentication errors.
Error 返回任何认证错误。

Method GetAuthenticatableKey of type Session in package guards: GetAuthenticatableKey returns the key of the authenticated user.
GetAuthenticatableKey 返回认证用户的键。

Method Guest of type Session in package guards: Guest verifies if the user is a guest (not authenticated).
Guest 验证用户是否为访客（未认证）。

Method Login of type Session in package guards: Login authenticates the user and stores in session.
Login 认证用户并存储在会话中。

Method Logout of type Session in package guards: Logout logs the user out of the session.
Logout 从会话中注销用户。

Method Once of type Session in package guards: Once authenticates the user without storing in session.
Once 认证用户但不存储在会话中。

Method User of type Session in package guards: User returns the currently authenticated user.
User 返回当前认证的用户。

Package database: Package database provides database functionality and singleton access.

Function Extend in package database: Extend registers a custom database connector.

Function GetQuery in package database: GetQuery executes a query to get a single result.

Query 执行查询并返回结果集合。

Function Select in package database: Select executes a select query and fills the destination with results.
Select 执行选择查询并将结果填充到目标中。

Function Transaction in package database: Transaction executes a callback within a database transaction.
Transaction 在数据库事务中执行回调。

Type Digest128 in package hash: Digest128 represents a partial evaluation of a 128 bites hash.

Method Sum128 of type Digest128 in package hash: sum128 computers two 64-bit hash value. It is assumed that
bmix was first called on the data to process complete blocks
of 16 bytes. The 'tail' is a slice representing the 'tail' (leftover
elements, fewer than 16). If pad_tail is true, we make it seem like
there is an extra element with value 1 appended to the tail.
The length parameter represents the full length of the data (including
the blocks of 16 bytes, and, if pad_tail is true, an extra byte).

Method Sum256 of type Digest128 in package hash: sum256 will compute 4 64-bit hash values from the input.
It is designed to never allocate memory on the heap. So it
works without any byte buffer whatsoever.
It is designed to be strictly equivalent to

				a1 := []byte{1}
	         hasher := murmur3.New128()
	         hasher.Write(data) // #nosec
	         v1, v2 := hasher.Sum128()
	         hasher.Write(a1) // #nosec
	         v3, v4 := hasher.Sum128()

See TestHashRandom.
Function PKCS7Padding in package encryption: PKCS7Padding 补码
Function PKCS7UnPadding in package encryption: PKCS7UnPadding 去码

Function Abort in package http: Abort 创建一个中止响应（通常用于中间件）

Function Back in package http: Back 重定向到前一个页面

Function BadRequest in package http: BadRequest 创建一个400响应

Type Document in package vector: Document represents a chunk of text to be indexed.

Type SimpleStore in package vector: SimpleStore is a simple in-memory vector store that can be saved to JSON.
It uses brute-force cosine similarity for search, which is fast enough for <10k docs.
Type Store in package vector: Store defines the interface for a vector database.
